ideas.title: Atomic Idea Timestamping
ideas.description: Publish a cryptographic timestamp for your idea so the network can prove when it was first submitted without revealing sensitive details.

ideas.title: Zero-Knowledge Proof Templates
ideas.description: Share reusable ZKP templates that let others verify attributes of your idea (ownership, originality) without revealing the content itself.

ideas.title: IP Escrow Flow for Idea Licensing
ideas.description: A smart-contract pattern to escrow idea access and release licensing rights automatically once on-chain conditions are met.

ideas.title: Selective Disclosure Protocol
ideas.description: Method for sharing only necessary fragments of an idea with prospective collaborators while proving ownership to the network.

ideas.title: Incentivized Review Mechanism
ideas.description: Design a token-based reputation and reward system for community reviewers that scales and resists manipulation.

ideas.title: Secure Collaboration Channels
ideas.description: Encrypted off-chain collaboration channels with on-chain anchors to prove the ordering and participants of discussions.
